response.overview: Merajul Islam (Born, 30 October 1995, Khulna, Bangladesh) is a Bangladeshi movie director, musician. Merajul Islam is a Bangladeshi singer, music maker, writer, composer, singer, and co-actor, and web developer also,. He is a technology lover and a fan of web development, and photography. From Bangladeshi, he wanted to do something different. He started his career as a lyricist and story writing. At a very young age, he started working in music and write, He is a good writer also. He is most famous as a social media influence but professionally he is an entrepreneur who has made a big name in the digital marketing and social media world.
response.title: Merajul Islam
